article_title: You know you're from Longmont if ...
article_text:
The Times-Call is looking for readers' completions of the following statements:

You know you're from Longmont if ... .

You know you're from Boulder if ... .

You know you're from Weld County if ...

Please send your completed statements to wbryen@times-call.com by 5 p.m. Monday, Jan. 26. So long as they are appropriate for a family newspaper, we will consider using your statements in an upcoming feature article.
